title: HR / Intern Management System
description: Role-based dashboards, onboarding/offboarding, Google Workspace automation, cron reminders. Stack: Next.js, Prisma, PostgreSQL, Node.js.

title: Automated Security Policy Compliance Checker
description: Dockerized agent/server. Nmap discovery and OpenSCAP scanning with tailored AC‑2/AC‑6 policies. React dashboard.

title: Digital Forensics Labs
description: Windows images analysis with Autopsy, FTK Imager, registry hives, SQLite artifacts. Formal investigation reports.

title: FitnessPro
description: Full‑stack fitness tracker prototype. React + Vite frontend, Node/Express API, Postgres DB.

title: Raspberry Pi Network Infra
description: Small‑office network services on Raspberry Pi. DHCP/DNS, monitoring, backups.
